reviews.review_msg: super knowledgeable about art and connection of visual arts to literature!  I was intimidated and he was hard to write a paper for, but my insight into the material was rewarded.  for carl, literature is allied to the fine arts...knowing this helps
This guy makes no sense, except maybe if you're high! If you don't like structure, go for him, if you want someone to say something tangeble, stay away from him!!!
